Thanks for the below (and the ARC).  That helped.

There's a fix in HEAD if you want to try it (Bug is
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=73833&atid=539099&func=detail&aid=1239155).

Yours,
St.Ack

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Ryan Gran <ryan@c...> wrote:
> I'm relatively new working with Heritrix, so please bear with me.
> 
> Think I made some progress, but I'll let you be the judge of that.  If 
> you need additional debug
> output, please put it in terms of arcreader/extractor (ARC HTTP 
> GETtable) isn't meaning
> much to me yet. =)
> 
> In any case:
>

> 
> 20050712000538 72.22.69.24

> 
> lcm:/Users/admin/heritrix-1.4.0/bin root# ./arcreader --format=dump 
> --offset=706489

> java.util.zip.InflaterInputStream.read(InflaterInputStream.java:122)

org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader.outputARCRecord(ARCReader.java:936)

problematic
